import React, { Component, lazy, Suspense } from 'react'; import $ from 'jquery'; import InputMask from 'react-input-mask'; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardFooter, CardHeader, Col, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Row, } from 'reactstrap'; class CadastrarUsuario extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.onRadioBtnClick = this.onRadioBtnClick.bind(this); this.state = { fullname: '', email:'', cpf:'', birthdate:'', sex: '', cep: '', endereco_numero: '', logradouro: '', bairro:'', cidade:'', uf:'', complemento:'', radioSelected: 2, }; } componentDidMount(){ // $('.date').mask('00/00/0000', { // placeholder: '__/__/____' // }); } handleChangeCEP = event => { var cep = event.target.value.replace(/([^\d])/, ''); this.setState({ [event.target.id]: cep }); if(this.state.cep.length == 8){ console.log("Iniciando busca por CEP"); fetch('api/selectcep?table=LOCALIDADE&cep='+this.state.cep) .then(res => { console.log(res); res.json(); var aux = []; res.recordset.forEach(e => { aux.push(e); console.log(aux); }); }) .catch(err => { }); } } clearFields = () => { this.setState({ fullname: '', email:'', cpf:'', birthdate:'', sex: '', cep: '', endereco_numero: '', logradouro: '', bairro:'', cidade:'', uf:'', complemento:'' }); } handleChange = event => { this.setState({ [event.target.id]: event.target.value }); } onRadioBtnClick(radioSelected) { this.setState({ sex: radioSelected.target.value, }); } render() { return (
Novo Candidato  Informações Pessoais
 Endereço
{/* */}
 
); } } export default CadastrarUsuario;
